title: Mars Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mars transiting your twelfth house redirects energy inward, activating hidden effort, isolation, and subconscious drives. Action happens behind the scenes, often without immediate recognition. Suppressed anger or restlessness may surface through sleep issues or mental fatigue if energy is not released constructively. Expenses related to travel, healing, or solitude can rise. When guided consciously, this transit supports disciplined withdrawal, strategic preparation, spiritual strength, and powerful inner transformation through controlled release.

sections.heading: Career
points: Progress comes through patience and planning.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Desire for emotional and physical space.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses rise on travel or recovery.

closing: Mars in the 12th house completes a cycle of action. When energy is consciously released and refined, inner power prepares you for the next decisive phase.
